subject: Re: Correction — 40% discount for Rise Studio Oyun Yazılım A.Ş.
text:
Hello Muhammed,

Thank you for applying through the Game Studio Discount form. Our earlier message may have caused some confusion. The codes below are exclusive 40% discount codes for Mobidictum Conference 2025 (21–22 October, Istanbul).

RISESTUDIOOYUNYA-01-72S — 40% off (1 ticket)
RISESTUDIOOYUNYA-02-FTM — 40% off (1 ticket)
RISESTUDIOOYUNYA-03-NDW — 40% off (1 ticket)

Redeem here: https://fienta.com/mobidictum-conference-2025

These codes apply to any ticket type and are reserved for Rise Studio Oyun Yazılım A.Ş.. This benefit comes from your application to the Game Studio Discount program, which we are expanding to improve access for more studios.

We look forward to welcoming the Rise Studio Oyun Yazılım A.Ş. team in Istanbul.

Best regards,

Mobidictum Conference Team
